amendment.description: To amend the Violent Crime Control and Law Enforcement Act of 1994, to reauthorize the Missing Alzheimer's Disease Patient Alert Program, and to promote initiatives that will reduce the risk of injury and death relating to the wandering characteristics of some children with autism.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1864 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1864 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Grassley. To amend the Violent Crime Control and Law Enforcement Act of 1994, to reauthorize the Missing Alzheimer's Disease Patient Alert Program, and to promote initiatives that will reduce the risk of injury and death relating to the wandering characteristics of some children with autism.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1864 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Grassley.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1864 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
